name: Doodlenoda
description:
A little game about a sock, Boris, trying to reach new heights to the beats of Mike Shinoda. This game was made as a fan project for artist Mike Shinoda and his community. This project was made off and on over the course of about three weeks. All suggestions and feedback are welcomed!

Controls:
Horizontal Movement: Left arrow key, Right arrow key OR A, D

Sound Burst: Space bar OR Mouse Click

Pause: Escape OR P

Notes:

- The game is designed to be run in full-screen mode.

- There is character screen border wrapping. Use it!
